channel.title: pics on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in pics on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Super great day with Colleen
item.description:
(written 00:07 Friday 04 October 2019 PDT) Colleen had to wait an extra hour for me to go through immigration and customs in Seattle. Once we hung out, though, it was like no time had passed!
Lively laughy fun dinner with Colleen and Ryan at their house while eating pizza.

item.title: planted some mini Alexii
item.description:
18:08 Wednesday 31 July 2019 JST Today the weather was quite lovely, so I spent some time outside repotting some baby plants that had come from Alex, who froze two winters ago. The original Alex can be seen in the first two pics here.
20:12 Wednesday 31 July 2019 JST I just got super sidetracked looking for Alex pictures, after finding a journal entry with a missing image of Alex.

Pics after 2018 lower Puna eruption riddled the area with lava flows

item.title: nuza building construction
item.description:
13:48 Thursday 25 October 2018 JST Next to Muza they are making a new building. I don’t know its name, so I am calling it Nuza, based on “new” and “Muza” Here are pics Oct 17th:
Oct 24th:

item.title: pics
item.description:
06:51 Saturday 29 September 2018 JST 今朝たくさん写真を取りました。 一番目は鳥の写真を取りました。
工事は興味があります。フランソワはユンボを運転しました。
おととい、面白い雲は家の上を飛んでいました。
３本の電線の写真も取りました。
小さい新しい家の工事も見ました。
すぎの二前の写真は別の日だけど同じ点から取りました。

item.title: mt3 pics and writeup
item.description: 11:00 Monday 30 April 2018 JST (written 00:11 Tuesday 01 May 2018 JST) Great progress on MT3 today. I shaved the bottom of the marble splitter chopsticks so the small marble could pass under them. I made a bit of a continuity mistake though by actually lifting one of the chopsticks a bit (instead of just shaving the bottom of it). These are pics from before the shave:

item.title: francois with cement
item.description:
15:30 Tuesday 10 April 2018 JST うちのと近くに新しいアパートが作られます。 New apartments are being built near our house. 今日、そこで写真を撮りました。 Today, I took pictures there.
三人はセメントを流し込みました。 Three people poured cement.
フランソワの写真を撮りました。 I took a picture of Francois. フランソワは写真を撮られました。 Francois had his picture taken.
ジオキャッシュが見つかりました。 The geocache was found. 09:46 Wednesday 11 April 2018 JST 私は生徒に違う時間にレッスンに来られた。 My students trickled in to class (interrupting the class each time). 生徒は私に「コラッ」と言われました。 My students got yelled at by me.

item.title: 今日は雪だ
item.description: 23:14 Monday 22 January 2018 JST There are probably errors in the Japanese notes below! 今日は雪たくさん降ふった。帰かえりの時写真をたくさん撮るとった。 駅に近い歩道 フェンスを跨またいだ 坂道を上る もみの木き 雪の日を楽しんでる子供 曲がり角のあたり 曲がり角 まがりかど この道の先を見る この塀の先を見る 他の塀の先を見る 下り坂途中。また上り坂が始まる。 公園の前の道 公園の木 階段の上から 階段の下から 道を見上げる 壁を見上げる 坂のずっと下を見てる 駐車ちゅうしゃしてある車両しゃりょう 雪をかぶっちゃた車 眠い木 目立つ 寒そう パノラマ 1 パノラマ 2 パノラマ 3 パノラマ 4

item.title: mt3: Glued first rib
item.description: 13 January 2018 JST (posted 00:08 Tuesday 23 January 2018 JST) Two pics from a few days ago when I set up a clamp to hold the first rib in place while it dried.

item.title: mt3: pics and toothpicks
item.description: 15:59 Tuesday 09 January 2018 JST I have worked on MT3 a few times since getting back. A couple days ago, progress was super slow and I did not even export a video clip, much less upload one. Today I got much further, after having figured out a way to lift the bridge, and then I had the green cutter guy make some curved toothpicks which will be used for rail supports to keep the large marbles on track during the 2nd to last U-turn.

item.description: 01:09 Thursday 28 December 2017 -02 pics or it didn’t happen 23:50 Friday 28 June 2019 JST pics added

item.title: Linux on the in-flight system
item.description: 13:06 Friday 06 October 2017 JST My inflight entertainment system rebooted itself and I got a few pics of the logs. Looks like it’s running X Window on Linux. Seems reasonable. Weird that mine rebooted while it seems none of the others did. Do we each have our own virtual server?

item.description:
2017-08-18 (written 00:09 Friday 06 October 2017 JST)
With GG

item.title: university pics scanned by Christine in 2011
item.description: 14:09 Monday 10 July 2017 JST On my way to Inbox Zero, I found these images which Christine scanned for me in 2011! I cannot remember if she scanned them before or after Lin and I had our wedding, but I know she scanned them twice, to get higher resolution! Thank you, Christine!

item.title: Old Minecraft pics
item.description: ##19:02 Wednesday 14 January 2015 JST## These are from about a year ago, when I was playing on my second Delta server map.

item.title: houston flooded 3
item.description: Houston flooded pics!! 9 October 1998 Updated 27 October 1998 with dry pictures Here is the original entry from when Houston flooded. Walking down Montrose toward the intersection with Allen Parkway, we saw this. "Wow; it's flooded." Yes, but understand that Allen Parkway goes under that intersection. Here is the normal version. This was taken from the middle of the intersection. I like how the red light reflects on the water.
